00051 /**** Storage Data ****/
00052 
00053 void node_free_curves(bNode *node)
00054 {
00055     curvemapping_free(node->storage);
00056 }
00057 
00058 void node_free_standard_storage(bNode *node)
00059 {
00060     MEM_freeN(node->storage);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void node_copy_curves(bNode *orig_node, bNode *new_node)
00064 {
00065     new_node->storage= curvemapping_copy(orig_node->storage);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void node_copy_standard_storage(bNode *orig_node, bNode *new_node)
00069 {
00070     new_node->storage= MEM_dupallocN(orig_node->storage);
00071 }

00075 const char *node_blend_label(bNode *node)
00076 {
00077     const char *name;
00078     RNA_enum_name(ramp_blend_items, node->custom1, &name);
00079     return IFACE_(name);
00080 }

00103 ListBase node_internal_connect_default(bNodeTree *ntree, bNode *node)
00104 {
00105     ListBase ret;
00106     bNodeSocket *fromsock_first=NULL, *tosock_first=NULL;   /* used for fallback link if no other reconnections are found */
00107     int datatype;
00108     int num_links_in = 0, num_links_out = 0, num_reconnect = 0;
00109 
00110     ret.first = ret.last = NULL;
00111 
00112     /* Security check! */
00113     if (!ntree)
00114         return ret;
00115 
00116     for (datatype=0; datatype < NUM_SOCKET_TYPES; ++datatype) {
00117         bNodeSocket *fromsock=NULL, *tosock=NULL;
00118         bNodeLink *link;
00119         
00120         /* Connect the first input of each type with outputs of the same type. */
00121         
00122         for (link=ntree->links.first; link; link=link->next) {
00123             if (link->tonode == node && link->tosock->type == datatype) {
00124                 fromsock = link->tosock;
00125                 ++num_links_in;
00126                 if (!fromsock_first)
00127                     fromsock_first = fromsock;
00128                 break;
00129             }
00130         }
00131         
00132         for (link=ntree->links.first; link; link=link->next) {
00133             if (link->fromnode == node && link->fromsock->type == datatype) {
00134                 tosock = link->fromsock;
00135                 ++num_links_out;
00136                 if (!tosock_first)
00137                     tosock_first = tosock;
00138                 
00139                 if (fromsock) {
00140                     bNodeLink *ilink = MEM_callocN(sizeof(bNodeLink), "internal node link");
00141                     ilink->fromnode = node;
00142                     ilink->fromsock = fromsock;
00143                     ilink->tonode = node;
00144                     ilink->tosock = tosock;
00145                     /* internal link is always valid */
00146                     ilink->flag |= NODE_LINK_VALID;
00147                     BLI_addtail(&ret, ilink);
00148                     
00149                     ++num_reconnect;
00150                 }
00151             }
00152         }
00153     }
00154     
00155     /* if there is one input and one output link, but no reconnections by type,
00156      * simply connect those two sockets.
00157      */
00158     if (num_reconnect==0 && num_links_in==1 && num_links_out==1) {
00159         bNodeLink *ilink = MEM_callocN(sizeof(bNodeLink), "internal node link");
00160         ilink->fromnode = node;
00161         ilink->fromsock = fromsock_first;
00162         ilink->tonode = node;
00163         ilink->tosock = tosock_first;
00164         /* internal link is always valid */
00165         ilink->flag |= NODE_LINK_VALID;
00166         BLI_addtail(&ret, ilink);
00167     }
00168     
00169     return ret;
00170 }
